#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;
int checksum(int x, int y)
{
    int a = x;
    int sum = 0;
    while(x>0)
    {sum = sum + x%10;
    x/=10;
    }
    
    if(y==sum+a)
    return 1;
    else return 0;
}

int main()
{
    int count,t,n,m,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    { count = 0;
    cin>>n;
      m=n;
      while(m>0)
      {
          m/=10;
           count++;
        }
        
        for(i=n-9*count;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(checksum(i,n))
            {cout<<i<<endl;
                break;
            }
        }
                   
        
        if(i>n)
        cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
        
    }
    
    
    
    return 0;
}
